MVUnexpectedExpensesStep1JSON: {"pageElements":[{"elements":[{"id":"intro","header":"How prepared are you?","description":"Let's set a Savings Goal to help you build a resource for unexpected expenses."},{"id":"image","imageUrl":"assets/icon/journeys/unexpectedExpenses/step1.svg","altText":"","maxWidth":"70%"},{"id":"table","header":"Emergency Expenses such as","rows":[{"answer":"$400","label":"Car Repair"},{"answer":"$2,500","label":"Roof Repair"},{"answer":"$7,000","label":"Death in The Family"},{"answer":"$5,000","label":"Medical Expenses"},{"answer":"4 Weeks","label":"Sudden Income Loss"}]},{"id":"button","label":"Continue","link":"default"}]}],"helpCards":[{"header":"Why should I consider an emergency fund?","description":"Check out this quick read for more information on why you need an emergency fund.","externalLink":"https://www.voya.com/article/emergency-funds-basics","imageUrl":"assets/icon/journeys/unexpectedExpenses/mobile.svg","altText":""}]}
MVUnexpectedExpensesStep4JSON: {"pageElements":[{"elements":[{"id":"intro","header":"Link your Account","description":"Now that you've set your goal, let's put that plan into action. \n\nYou can easily track your savings progress by linking an emergency savings account to myVoyage.","marginBottom":"22px"},{"id":"image","imageUrl":"assets/icon/journeys/unexpectedExpenses/link_account.svg"},{"id":"input","answerId":"linkExistingAccount","type":"accountRadioButton","radioLabel":"Select an account you would like to use as your emergency savings account","bold":true,"default":"","validationRules":{"type":"dollar","decimalPlaces":0,"min":0,"max":9999999},"marginBottom":"28px"},{"id":"contentModal","header":"+ Add New Account","marginBottom":"28px","elements":[{"id":"manageMXaccount","header":"Add Account","description":""}]},{"id":"intro","header":"","description":"If you don't have an account designated for emergency savings, you may want to consider opening one to help keep your savings on track."},{"id":"button","label":"Continue","link":"default","noBackLink":"false","noSpacing":"true"},{"id":"button","label":"Not Now","link":"default","type":"secondary","noSpacing":"true"},{"id":"image","imageUrl":"assets/icon/journeys/hsa/secure-connection-lock.svg","description":"Secure Connection","maxWidth":"150px","marginTop":"20px"}]}]}
MVUnexpectedExpensesStep3JSON: {"pageElements":[{"elements":[{"id":"intro","header":"Our recommendations","description":"Here's what we suggest you consider for your emergency savings goal.","marginBottom":"22px"},{"pageElements":[{"backgroundColor":"rgba(118, 197, 228, 0.3)","marginBottom":"48px","elements":[{"id":"rowWithImage","imageUrl":"assets/icon/journeys/unexpectedExpenses/target.svg","answerId":"defaultEmergencySavingGoal","description":"Your Emergency Savings Goal:"},{"id":"rowWithImage","imageUrl":"assets/icon/journeys/unexpectedExpenses/calendar.svg","answerId":"defaultTargetMonthlyContribution","description":"Target Monthly Contributions:"},{"id":"contentModal","header":"How did we come up with these numbers?","isContentDynamicModal":true,"elements":[{"id":"intro","descriptions":"Our guidance is based on the information that you provided as well as the following calculation:","bold":false,"textColor":"#d75426","elements":[{"defaultHeader":"Your Gross Weekly Income (grossWeeklyIncome)","defaultDescription":"Your Gross yearly Income grossYearIncome, divided by # of weeks in a year weeksInYear"},{"defaultHeader":"Your Emergency Saving Goal (defaultEmergencySavingGoal)","defaultDescription":"Your Gross weekly income grossWeeklyIncome, multiplied by # of weeks of income you would like to be prepared to replace jobLossWeeks, minus the amount of money you have already saved savedMoney"},{"defaultHeader":"Your Target Monthly Contibutions for the Next 3 Years (defaultTargetMonthlyContribution)","defaultDescription":"Your Emergency Saving Goal defaultEmergencySavingGoal divided by number of months in three years monthsOfThreeYears"}]}]}]}]},{"id":"intro","description":"Remember, even small amounts can add up. Consider adjusting your monthly contributions to help you get to your goal even faster."},{"id":"input","answerId":"adjustGoal","type":"radioButtonInput","label":"Do you want to adjust your Target Monthly Contributions?","bold":true,"marginBottom":"0px","options":[{"label":"No","default":true,"id":"adjustGoalNo","imageUrl":"assets/icon/journeys/radioButtons/checkNo.svg"},{"label":"Yes","id":"adjustGoalYes","imageUrl":"assets/icon/journeys/radioButtons/checkYes.svg","elements":[{"id":"input","type":"slider","largeInput":true,"answerId":"adjustedUnexpectedGoal","label":"How many weeks worth of income would you like to save for?","bold":true,"buttonLabel":"Reset","validationRules":{"type": "number","min":1,"max":52,"emptyAllowed":false,"decimalPlaces":0},"defaultId":"adjustedJobLossWeeks","rows":[{"answerId":"adjustedEmergencySavingGoal","label":"Your Emergency Savings Goal","type":"textField"},{"answerId":"adjustedTargetMonthlyContribution","label":"Target Monthly Contribtuions for the next 3 years","type":"textField"}]}]}]},{"id":"button","label":"Continue","link":"default"}]}]}
